summary: A Nine Divines Chapel, for Riverwood, a player abode(a place to live and work) for Monks, Priest, and Paladins. Includes Shrines, Priest Quarters(1 for players). Religious text(The Ten Commands of the Nine Divines), An NPC Priest/Merchant. Catacombs, and 2 Display cases(in chapel) for relics recovered-obtained by the player. Navmeshed,
descriptionHtml:
Description
A Nine Divines Chapel, for Riverwood, a player abode(a place to live) for Monks, Priest, and Paladins. Includes Shrines, Priest Quarters(1 for players). Religious text(The Ten Commands of the Nine Divines), An NPC Priest/Merchant. Catacombs/Hall of the Dead, and 2 Display cases(in chapel) for relics recovered-obtained by the player. Navmeshed,

Location
Behind Riverwood(near the mountains) has a map marker. Follow the road beside the Inn.

Log
Version .30

Notes to Player
The players abode is in the dorm area includes a player chest. 2 Player bookcases; 1 in priest commons area and one in your dorm room.

RPG
You are assigned to the Riverwood Chapel by the Order of the Nine Divines.


Future
Lots of work to do on this one, esp the catacombs/Hall of the Dead..Quest, Quest Giver, Improvements to the Chapel, Etc..


Credits
Bethesda - For Skyrim
Steam and Nexus-For their Support of Modders
All Modders-whose work inspires me.


Install
Nexus(manual)
d/l, Unrar, place .esp & .ckm files in your data directory, make sure the .esp is ticked.
Steam
Subscribe



Comments, Questions, Discussion Welcome!!


Thats about it --have fun, subscribe, favorites, endorse-- Chaz916
author: chaz916
